entry.title: Paper Deadline Extended
entry.summary: The deadline for paper submissions is now September 11th.
entry.content:
The deadline for submitting papers has been extended by a week and is now September 11th 2020.

If you have any questions about submitting a paper, please email the committee at sc-ws-pyhpc2020@info.supercomputing.org or ask on Twitter @PythonHPC.

entry.title: PyHPC 2020 is Now Virtual
entry.content:
SC20 has gone fully virtual! And as such, we are happy to announce that PyHPC 2020 will also be held virtually.

The new date for the workshop will be November 13th 2020.

Stay tuned! Over the next few weeks, we will provide details about how the workshop will work.

entry.title: Call for Submissions
entry.summary: The PyHPC 2020 Call for Submissions is now open!
entry.content: We are looking for paper and lightning talk submissions to the 9th Workshop on Python for High-Performance and Scientific Computing. More information can be found at our Call for Submissions.

entry.title: Python at SC 20
entry.content:
Update July 28: SC20 has gone virtual, please check the new update.

This year, PyHPC returns to Supercomputing with the 9th Workshop on Python for High-Performance and Scientific Computing on November 15, 2020. The Call for Submissions will be available shortly.

See you in Atlanta!
